changeSet.sql: create table ext_netdump ( ts_sec number, ts_usec number, eth_src varchar2(17), eth_dst varchar2(17), ip_src varchar2(15), hostname_src varchar2(255), ip_dst varchar2(15), hostname_dst varchar2(255), ip_len number, ip_sum number ) organization external ( type oracle_loader default directory dwh_netdumps_dir access parameters ( records delimited by newline skip 1 fields terminated by ',' lrtrim ( ts_sec, ts_usec, eth_src, eth_dst, ip_src, hostname_src, ip_dst, hostname_dst, ip_len, ip_sum) ) location ('live.csv') ) reject limit unlimited;
